titles.title: Patient Care Employees Protection Act
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to prohibit forced overtime hours for certain health care employees who provide care to patients.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/17/2001--Introduced. Patient Care Employees Protection Act - Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to limit the number of overtime hours which employers may require of health care employees, other than physicians, who provide care to patients.
